title: luvamia Capris Jeans for Women Trendy High Waisted Patch Pocket Casual Summer Cropped Stretchy Denim Skinny Capri Pants
description: Women's capri pants feature a high waist and a skinny leg design for a flattering silhouette that accentuates your curves
Equipped with front patch pockets and back welt pockets, summer capris combine practicality with style, allowing you to carry your essentials
Crafted from stretchy cotton blend, womens stretch jeans offer comfort and flexibility, ensuring ease of movement throughout the day

High waisted jean capris for women are incredibly versatile, allowing you to create a range of looks. Dress them up with a chic blouse and sandals for a night out, or keep it casual with a simple tank top and sneakers for a relaxed day out.

luvamia women denim capris run standard US sizes. Size small fits size 4 size 6, size Medium fits size 8 size 10, size Large fits size 12 size 14, size X-Large fits size 16 size 18, size XX-Large fits size 20 size 22. Capris inseam: 20''
